body: Hey so sorry guys. There was one part that I couldn't really come up with a good translation or something I think and so I kind of just gave up and forgot about it. Others seem to have translated this already anyway and have done a far better and more professional job than I could have ever done so probably accept that you had to wait or something I don't know man. Maybe I should join a translation group...
Yep... love this story. Fantastic art. And yeah Hyuji, if the translations are saying they're just neighbors, the incest tag would be kinda outa place. Good luck with finishing said translations.
Hey hyuji  lıke you dude. feed our emptyness  with your translate please.
omg, It's a god like art...
Ok so I started doing it today and I'm halfway done. I'll do more tomorrow.
Also, just a thought, but is this really incest if they're neighbours?

OK Sennekis. I have handed in my major assignment already so I just need to finish all the small stuff and I'll get to work on it. Anyway ideas on the best way to do so? (I don't know good image editing software for this).

Hmmm I really, really liked this. Maybe I should translate it for you guys, then, once I hand in my assignment (so give me a week). Don't get your hopes up though, I get pretty shitty at myself when I can't translate something and will probably stop if that happens, but having read it it'll probably be fine.
Translation please.I don't care if I die.Die a long time ago
